titles.title: Increasing the statutory limit on the public debt.

action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of S. Con. Res. 21, H.J. Res. 43 is considered passed House.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

calendar.text: Committee on Finance. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Finance. Reported by Senator Baucus without amendment. With written report No. 110-184.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 384.

action.text: Star Print ordered on the report.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 42. Record Vote Number: 354.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 9/29/2007--Public Law. Increases the statutory limit on the public debt from $8.965 trillion to $9.815 trillion.
